DOC.brief_summary: The objective trial compare snack ingredient ( whole grain dietary fiber ) slow carbohydrate digestion similar control snack without ingredient evaluate effect snack glycemic response subjective satiety . The test product compare control product well white bread randomize , control , crossover trial include 20 healthy male female age 18 70 body mass index ( BMI ) 25 30 kg/m2 . Following overnight fast , participant give study product random order least week apart . Glucose insulin measure product consumption period four hour . Visual analog scale measure subjective satiety also administer period four hour .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Glycemic Responses Subjective Ratings Satiety Snack With Without Ingredients Slow Carbohydrate Digestion
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy male female age 18 70 inclusive 2 . No chronic medication oral contraceptive 3 . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 25 30 kg/m2 inclusive . 4 . Body weight stable 5 kg range 3 month prior study entry 1 . Pregnant nursing baby 2 . Women childbearing potential unwilling use effective mean contraception study could include abstinence . 3 . Adults unable consent prisoner
